title: Fast, Fun,...
description: Fast, Fun, and easy to teach. I enjoyed playing this with my family during the pandemic, and It is one of my new favorite games to play

title: A surprisi...
description: A surprisingly simple yet deep experience that provides a level of fulfillment not many expensive, hobbiest-oriented/big box games do. I was surprised that at $11.99 this game would bring me so much joy, but I guess it having Spiel des Jahres 2017 should've been indicative enough of that. Excellent game.
